channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole near drain on Ermin Way, 26th January
item.description:
A pothole has formed near the grid due to flood water persistently running over this spot and increased traffic due to A417 road closures. This is different to incident 5493522 which was logged on 26-Jan, and also resolved 26-Jan but this was not also fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous metal bits sticking out, 26th January
item.description:
Same exact issue next to two bins opposite cobblers corner and opposite Primark bin there's dangerous sharp steel metal sticking out of the ground giving hazard to barefoot (many do walk barefoot on night out). Please smooth it out with grinder or something. Regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 200, High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge has been extremely damaged, 26th January
item.description:
Opposite number 32 Yarnolds Demolition work of old garages at rear of Tewkesbury council housing. Large HGV Lorrie’s have damaged the verge extensively causing pavement and road being covered in mud and debris. This is the cause for quite a few verges in the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Yarnolds, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain very blocked, 26th January
item.description:
Drain is blocked at the bottom of Dark Lane, just by the junction onto Whitelands lane. I have tried clearing many times but it’s just filled up with muck. Been like it for a few months now so would appreciate it being cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Central island bollard and Give Way sign damaged at junction of Park Place and Andover Road, Cheltenham, 26th January
item.description:
The island bollard is damaged and the Give Way sign decapitated. Someone has been out to secure the remains of the light over the Give Way sign so it is safe. BUT this crossing is an accident grey spot - there have been two deaths at this junction in the last twenty or so years - and the sign urgently needs replacing. It is now nearly a month since the damage was done. Please speed up the repairs to increase safety at this junction. LOCATION just west of Andover Road junction with Park Place, Cheltenhamm, as shown on the attached map.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andover Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath has been altered, gate padlocked, 26th January
item.description:
Field belonging to Leafield Cottage on Green Lane Little Witcombe, where the footpath adjoins Green Lane, and the stream goes under Green Lane. The field houses two aggressive dogs with poor boundary fencing, which are left unattended for some time. The hedge next to the footpath has been cut to widen, which has become adopted as the pathway. The two issues I raise are the blocking of an existing footpath, but also the two dogs which on occasion have got out and attacked other dogs. Any dog can be trained but these are left unattended and with the poor boundary fencing it needs reporting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 26th January
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 street lights are out, 26th January
item.description:
59, 57, 55, 53 The Park - in front of each of these houses the street lighting is not working. About 5 weeks ago we had an attempted burglary foiled by our dogs. We are worried that they may return so we need this lighting operational as soon as possible please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Park, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed sign on the corner of Keynsham Road and London Road, 26th January
item.description:
Road traffic sign left on the corner of Keynsham Road and London Road. Road was closed late last year (2023) but the sign has never been retrieved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Keynsham Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
